name: chicagotribune
text: The Louisville police officers who shot Breonna Taylor were told she should be home alone and her apartment was a “soft target” after the main target was arrested elsewhere, according to an interview with one of the detectives who served the warrant https://t.co/4uDNuJJEy7

name: chicagotribune
text: Commentary: Gov. J.B. Pritzker is putting big money behind the campaign for a graduated income tax. “But he’s just one Illinois billionaire, up against many of the state’s top income earners willing to bankroll the battle to stop his plan from passing.” https://t.co/sGkW5N8PjF

name: chicagotribune
text: Band of Bohemia, the nation’s only Michelin-starred brewpub, has temporarily closed and issued a public apology after accusations of fostering a hostile workplace and mismanagement that led to the departure of its executive chef. https://t.co/y0dNURVfPx

name: chicagotribune
text:

name: chicagotribune
text: Two Joliet police sergeants have been placed on administrative duty following the release of a video showing the arrest of a man who later died. https://t.co/Hp8nFLXVCP
